question: Today more people are travelling than ever before.Why is this case?What are the benefits of travelling for the travellers?
text: It is irrefutable that the people travel a lot in this contemporary era, as compared to the past. The advancement in the technology has brought a dramatic swing in the mode of transportation. Overall, the travellers are gaining innumerable advantages due this practice; which is elaborated further.

To begin with, a predominant reason for the modern travelling pattern is a globalization of the planet. The enhanced vehicles have formed the perception of a world into a global village by enriching the international trades. Although, the distances between the isolated countries are too large, the hi-tech planes and trains have enabled the effective and commercial travel. For instance, in the seventeenth century, the ships are the only mode of the transits for the navigators. While, the planes in the modern age are the time saving and comfortable mode of travel for the people. Thus, the innovation is the major factor to boost the desires of the travellers.

In addition, the elevated trend of travelling is lucrative for the travellers. The experiences of new routes and destinations would inculcate many curiosities in the travellers. Consequently, the exchange of knowledge between two cultures and countries is possible. Moreover, the travelling will frame many life time unforgettable memories for the travellers, as well as realize them a feeling of satisfaction. For example, the international travellers are getting the opportunity to learn about different cultures, food habits and virtues; to enrich their skills and knowledge. Thus, the travelling is vital for the people.

In conclusion, the travelling is not only beneficial to an individual, but also the society will develop due to aware about the diversities. Thus, the harmony and peace in the community are revealing the efforts of many travellers.
